items.desc: Each round: Equip 2 random Ornn Artifacts. [Consumes 3 item slots.]

items.name: Crest Of Cinders
items.desc:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row gain the Crest of Cinders.

Units with the Crest of Cinders empower their attacks to Burn their target for 7% of their maximum health as true damage and apply 33% Wound.

[Support item]
[Unique - only one per champion]

items.name: Virtue of the Martyr
items.desc:
Every 5 seconds, heal all allies for 6.5% of their max Health. When the holder dies, the healing increases to 13% max Health and continue for 10 seconds.

​​[Support item]

items.name: Zeke's Herald
items.desc:
Combat start: Grant 30% Attack Speed to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

[Support item]
items.shortDesc:
+AS
wearer and
allies within
2 hex in
the same row

items.name: Zephyr
items.desc:
Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

Your team gains 8% Attack Speed.

​​[Support item]
[Ignores crowd control immunity.]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.name: Zz'Rot Portal
items.desc:
Combat start: Summon a large Voidspawn that Taunts nearby enemies.

​​[Support item]

items.name: Jak'sho the Protean
items.desc:
Combat Start: The holder gains two effects, regardless of starting position.

Front Two Rows: 45 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 1 Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: 45 Ability Power. Gain 15 Mana every 3 seconds.

items.name: Midnight Reaper
items.desc: Deal 20% bonus damage. After falling below 20% Health, increase this to 45% for the rest of combat.
items.fromDesc:
+25 Attack Damage
+25 Ability Power
+25 Armor
+20% Crit

items.name: Royal Crownshield
items.desc: Combat start: Gain a 40% max health Shield for 8 seconds. When the shield expires, gain 50 Ability Power.

items.name: Equinox
items.desc:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Grant 50 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 15 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

+50 AR & MR

AR and taking
within 2 Hex

items.name: Nashors' Tooth Radiant
items.desc: After casting an Ability, gain 60% Attack Speed for 8 seconds. Attack Speed is applied after the holder's cast time completes.

items.name: Blue Buff
items.desc:
Max mana reduce by 10.

If the holder gets a takedown within 3 seconds of casting, gain 10 Mana.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.shortDesc:
After casting
a ability
wearer's mana
is set to 10.

items.name: Refractor Beam
items.desc: Apex Turret's ability fires multiple laser beams which deal increased damage. It gains 100% of all mana that Heimerdinger generates from traits, items, and augments.
items.shortDesc:
1 Count: 3 beams, 20% increased damage.
2 Count: 3 beams, 50% increased damage.
3 Count: 3 beams, 100% increased damage.
